item.title: Coding di termux lebih mudah
item.description: original shortcut for temux (important) ctrl+alt+up : swich session ctrl+alt+down: swich session ctrl+alt+right: open slide ctrl+alt+left: close slide ctrl+a c : add tabs ctrl+a ctrl
